application.name: Gorgeous
application.description: Your quick guide to Dragon City! Get detailed information about every dragon, events like Heroic Race, calculators, and more.

donation.description: Support our project with a donation. We do not offer direct benefits to donors at the moment, but your help will be immensely appreciated!

features.title: Always Updated
features.description: Stay ahead with real-time updates on game content and features.

features.title: Multi-Language Support
features.description: Interact in your preferred language, making it easier for everyone.

features.title: Slash & Prefix Commands
features.description: Enjoy flexibility with both modern slash commands and traditional text commands.
